wobani.component.light.blinnphong

Class BlinnPhongShaderHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • wobani.component.light.blinnphong.BlinnPhongShaderHelper

  • public class BlinnPhongShaderHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class which helps the Blinn-Phong light sources in the communication with the VGA. It contains a FloatBuffer, an IntBuffer and all the methods necessary to fill these buffers and then you can pass them to the VGA.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.nio.FloatBuffer FLOAT_BUFFER
      FloatBuffer for frequent shader updates.
      private java.nio.IntBuffer INT_BUFFER
      IntBuffer for frequent shader updates.
